FuncDef: The undo mac-address sticky command deletes the MAC address entries learned after the sticky MAC function is enabled on an interface. The undo mac-address sticky command deletes the MAC address entries learned after the sticky MAC function is enabled on an interface. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 characters.

Specifies the ID of a VLAN to which the outbound interface belongs.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
